title: Haunted Spouse
description: A man, a woman, and a haunted house.Normally, architect Jared Rutledge wouldn't be caught dead designing a haunted house. He considered them "frivolous structures." But then he was asked to build one to raise funds for a physical rehabilitation clinic, and he agreed to do it. After all, how hard could it be?Before long, he realized that building a haunted house could be an absolute nightmare. And when things started to go wrong, Jared was forced to ask for help. That meant calling the Scream Queen, Lizzie Wilcox, a renowned haunted house designer who just happened to be his ex-wife!
author: Heather Allison
